entry.title: CommandLineLib 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content: CommandLineLib is a simple-to-use PHP component that provides a high-quality command line parser via a fluid interface.

entry.title: repustateApi 0.1.0 (stable)
entry.content: This is a simple PHP client for repustate.com's API for semantic analysis. Originally built for the 'Beyond Frameworks' tutorial blog posts.
